HeroClassCards.Name: Fighter
HeroClassCards.Description: A trained combatant in all manner of weapons and armor. What you lack in arcane knowledge you make up for in pure physical prowess.

ClassAbilities.Name: Power Strike
ClassAbilities.Effect: Attack 1 creature within 1 space. The attack can use any weapon you have, but the damage dice is increased to 1d12, if the weapons damage is less than that.

ClassAbilities.Name: Shield Wall
ClassAbilities.Effect: Allies within 1 space of you add +1 to their defense rolls.

HeroClassCards.Name: Thief
HeroClassCards.Description: A master of stealth, deception, and agility. You strike from the shadows and take what you need before anyone notices.

ClassAbilities.Name: Distracting Flourish
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose a creature within 5 spaces and roll your Cha die. The next defense roll the target makes is reduced by the result.

ClassAbilities.Name: Evasion
ClassAbilities.Effect: Gain +2 to defense rolls against attacks originating from more that 1 space away.

HeroClassCards.Name: Ranger
HeroClassCards.Description: A hunter and survivalist, skilled in ranged combat and tracking. You are at home in the wilderness.

ClassAbilities.Name: Rapid Shot
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose an attack from a weapon that you have equipped. The attack must target a creature more than 1 space away, and have infinite uses. Activate that attack twice.

ClassAbilities.Name: Finsish the Hunt
ClassAbilities.Effect: Your attack rolls have +1 against targets with less than half their maximum hearts.

HeroClassCards.Name: Cleric
HeroClassCards.Description: A devoted servant of the divine, wielding holy magic to heal and protect allies while smiting foes.

ClassAbilities.Name: Healing Touch
ClassAbilities.Effect: Restore a number of to an ally within reach equal to a roll of your Wis die.

ClassAbilities.Name: Divine Protection
ClassAbilities.Effect: Undead that attack you must roll their attack twice and take the lower result.

HeroClassCards.Name: Bard
HeroClassCards.Description: A charismatic performer and jack-of-all-trades, using music and magic to inspire allies and deceive foes.

ClassAbilities.Name: Inspiring Tune
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose a creature that can hear you. The next dice that creature rolls increases by 1 for that roll.

ClassAbilities.Name: Silver Tongue
ClassAbilities.Effect: Whenever you roll your Cha dice to pursuade, lie, or intimidate, you add +1 to the result.

HeroClassCards.Name: Mage
HeroClassCards.Description: A scholar of the arcane, capable of wielding powerful spells but physically frail.

ClassAbilities.Name: Fireball
ClassAbilities.Effect: Choose a space within 5 spaces of you. Each creature in that space, or adjacent to it, loses 1d4 hearts (roll seperatly for each effected creature).

ClassAbilities.Name: Arcane Defence
ClassAbilities.Effect: Your defense rolls use your Int instead of your Dex.
